name: Notiforward
tagline: Notiforward is an open-source notification forwarding platform that uses your own database that you control.
body:
### Welcome to Notiforward
Notiforward is an open-source notification forwarding platform that uses your own database that you control.  The platform currently consists of an Android app and Chrome extension.  The app and extension communicate with each other using a Firebase database that only you have access too.

### Getting Started
1. Creating your own database is very simple and takes only a few minutes.  You can follow our [step by step guide](https://github.com/YeomansIII/notiforward-android/wiki/Notiforward-Setup-(Getting-Started)).
2. After setting up your database, you can download both the Chrome extension and Android app.
    - [Download Chrome Extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/notiforward/nlggacdddjcmehidpllhadpgonffpiji)
    - [Download Android App](https://play.google.com/apps/testing/io.yeomans.notiforward)

### Contributors
Created and maintained by Jason Yeomans(@yeomansiii).
If you would like to help, please create issues, pull requests, or communicate directly with Jason.

### Support
If you are having any issues, please create an issue in the respective repository.

[Android App](https://github.com/YeomansIII/notiforward-android/issues)

[Chrome Extension](https://github.com/YeomansIII/notiforward-chrome/issues)
